title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2/KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and movable, but they do not have any effect.
EB: Scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example.
SR: Disable the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example to prevent confusion for users when interacting with small images that do not require scrolling.
